bn.hero_subtitle: 🦐 For Seasonal Multi-Species Prediction, Monitoring & Global Export Support 🦀
bn.prob_statement: Aquaculture management and seafood export planning face challenges due to seasonal variability, water quality fluctuations, disease risks, and the absence of integrated systems. This project develops an AI-based system that predicts seasonal multi-species production, farm health, and export-ready quantities.
bn.feat_disease_desc: Real-time analysis of water parameters to predict disease risks.
bn.feat_loc_desc: AI suggests the best locations for new ponds.
bn.feat_yield_desc: Estimate your future harvest and maximize profitability.
bn.loc_desc: Find the perfect spot for your next aquaculture venture.
bn.farmer_desc: Manage your ponds and optimize your production.
bn.market_desc: Find the best prices for your harvest from international buyers.
bn.tech_desc: Directly connect with aquaculture experts to solve your pond problems.
bn.dist_desc: Real-time environmental and expert data for your specific region.
bn.bot_hello: Hello! How can I help your farm today?
bn.bot_default_reply: I'm analyzing your farm data... Maintaining water pH and checking for early disease signs is recommended!
bn.bot_growth_reply: For faster growth, check your Feed Conversion Ratio (FCR) in the Sustainability tool.
bn.bot_price_reply: Market prices for Vannamei are trending UP (+5%). Check the Global Market hub!
bn.unlock_insights: Unlock regional insights by analyzing a location.
bn.order_msg: Order placed for {qty} tons of {species} from {country}.
bn.dist_insight: Localized insights for {dist}: Market demand is high for premium exports. Water conditions are optimal.
bn.stock_desc: Optimal density planning for healthy growth.
bn.harvest_desc: Predict best harvest time, size, and export quality.
bn.vision_desc: Upload photos of fish/shrimp for instant disease detection.
bn.eco_tracker_desc: Track your water usage, FCR, and carbon footprint.
bn.aquacare_desc: Actionable precautions and growth secrets to prevent crop loss and maximize yield.
bn.secure_history: Securely store and track your pond history
bn.intl_markets: Verify your batch for international markets
bn.diagnose_visually: Diagnose diseases visually using Computer Vision
bn.vision_engine: Our AI scanning engine will look for skin spots, gill damage, and shell anomalies.
bn.demo_desc: Enable to see OTPs directly in the browser without Twilio/Email keys.
bn.special_tip_biosecurity: Biosecurity: Limit access to authorized personnel only.
bn.special_tip_sampling: Proactive Sampling: Weigh fish weekly to adjust feed.
bn.special_tip_aeration: Emergency Aeration: Keep backup motors ready 24/7.
bn.tip_automatic_feeders: Tip: Use automatic feeders to reduce wastage by 15%.
bn.precaution_cold_chain: Ensure cold chain traceability in logistics
bn.precaution_salinity_final: Monitor water salinity strictly in final stage
bn.precaution_renewable: Switch to renewable energy for aerators to lower carbon score
bn.tip_maintain_do_above_50_mg/l_to_reduce_: Maintain DO above 5.0 mg/L to reduce stress
bn.tip_increase_aeration___add_1_aerator_pe: Increase aeration - add 1 aerator per hectare
bn.tip_perform_20%_partial_water_exchange_w: Perform 20% partial water exchange with treated water
bn.tip_high_turbidity_detected___check_for_: High turbidity detected - check for algae bloom
bn.tip_sudden_temp_drop_alert___reduce_feed: Sudden temp drop alert - reduce feeding
bn.tip_ammonia_spike_alert___increase_aerat: Ammonia spike alert - increase aerator runtime by 2 hours
bn.tip_turn_on_fant_sets_aerators_between_3: Turn on Fant Sets (Aerators) between 3 AM and 6 AM when DO is lowest
bn.tip_for_prawns:_run_aerators_24/7_after_: For Prawns: Run aerators 24/7 after Day 60 to maintain growth
bn.tip_for_fish:_if_fish_gulp_for_air_at_su: For Fish: If fish gulp for air at surface, turn on Fant Sets immediately
bn.tip_ensure_1_hp_fant_set_per_500kg_of_bi: Ensure 1 HP Fant Set per 500kg of biomass for peak efficiency
bn.market_global_desc: Browse and order from international aquaculture suppliers

pt.market_global_desc: Browse and order from international aquaculture suppliers

mi.hero_subtitle: 🦐 For Seasonal Multi-Species Prediction, Monitoring & Global Export Support 🦀
mi.prob_statement: Aquaculture management and seafood export planning face challenges due to seasonal variability, water quality fluctuations, disease risks, and the absence of integrated systems. This project develops an AI-based system that predicts seasonal multi-species production, farm health, and export-ready quantities.
mi.feat_disease_desc: Real-time analysis of water parameters to predict disease risks.
mi.feat_loc_desc: AI suggests the best locations for new ponds.
mi.feat_yield_desc: Estimate your future harvest and maximize profitability.
mi.loc_desc: Find the perfect spot for your next aquaculture venture.
mi.farmer_desc: Manage your ponds and optimize your production.
mi.market_desc: Find the best prices for your harvest from international buyers.
mi.tech_desc: Directly connect with aquaculture experts to solve your pond problems.
mi.dist_desc: Real-time environmental and expert data for your specific region.
mi.bot_hello: Hello! How can I help your farm today?
mi.bot_default_reply: I'm analyzing your farm data... Maintaining water pH and checking for early disease signs is recommended!
mi.bot_growth_reply: For faster growth, check your Feed Conversion Ratio (FCR) in the Sustainability tool.
mi.bot_price_reply: Market prices for Vannamei are trending UP (+5%). Check the Global Market hub!
mi.unlock_insights: Unlock regional insights by analyzing a location.
mi.order_msg: Order placed for {qty} tons of {species} from {country}.
mi.dist_insight: Localized insights for {dist}: Market demand is high for premium exports. Water conditions are optimal.
mi.stock_desc: Optimal density planning for healthy growth.
mi.harvest_desc: Predict best harvest time, size, and export quality.
mi.vision_desc: Upload photos of fish/shrimp for instant disease detection.
mi.eco_tracker_desc: Track your water usage, FCR, and carbon footprint.
mi.aquacare_desc: Actionable precautions and growth secrets to prevent crop loss and maximize yield.
mi.secure_history: Securely store and track your pond history
mi.intl_markets: Verify your batch for international markets
mi.diagnose_visually: Diagnose diseases visually using Computer Vision
mi.vision_engine: Our AI scanning engine will look for skin spots, gill damage, and shell anomalies.
mi.demo_desc: Enable to see OTPs directly in the browser without Twilio/Email keys.
mi.special_tip_biosecurity: Biosecurity: Limit access to authorized personnel only.
mi.special_tip_sampling: Proactive Sampling: Weigh fish weekly to adjust feed.
mi.special_tip_aeration: Emergency Aeration: Keep backup motors ready 24/7.
mi.tip_automatic_feeders: Tip: Use automatic feeders to reduce wastage by 15%.
mi.precaution_cold_chain: Ensure cold chain traceability in logistics
mi.precaution_salinity_final: Monitor water salinity strictly in final stage
mi.precaution_renewable: Switch to renewable energy for aerators to lower carbon score
mi.tip_maintain_do_above_50_mg/l_to_reduce_: Maintain DO above 5.0 mg/L to reduce stress
mi.tip_increase_aeration___add_1_aerator_pe: Increase aeration - add 1 aerator per hectare
mi.tip_perform_20%_partial_water_exchange_w: Perform 20% partial water exchange with treated water
mi.tip_high_turbidity_detected___check_for_: High turbidity detected - check for algae bloom
mi.tip_sudden_temp_drop_alert___reduce_feed: Sudden temp drop alert - reduce feeding
mi.tip_ammonia_spike_alert___increase_aerat: Ammonia spike alert - increase aerator runtime by 2 hours
mi.tip_turn_on_fant_sets_aerators_between_3: Turn on Fant Sets (Aerators) between 3 AM and 6 AM when DO is lowest
mi.tip_for_prawns:_run_aerators_24/7_after_: For Prawns: Run aerators 24/7 after Day 60 to maintain growth
mi.tip_for_fish:_if_fish_gulp_for_air_at_su: For Fish: If fish gulp for air at surface, turn on Fant Sets immediately
mi.tip_ensure_1_hp_fant_set_per_500kg_of_bi: Ensure 1 HP Fant Set per 500kg of biomass for peak efficiency
